title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.10 - Forthwith suspension of bingo game
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.10 - Forthwith suspension of bingo game

State Regulations

The municipal governing body or the commission may
forthwith suspend the operation of any licensed bingo game pending hearing, in
which case the hearing must be held within 10 days after such
suspension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4830.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
